exposurecontrol: Manual Exposure, Program Shift, Safety Shift, AE Lock
shootingcapacity: Approx. 315 shots using LCD monitor, Approx. 335 shots when using Electronic Viewfinder
lcdmonitor: 2.8-inch TFT Color Vari-angle LCD with wide viewing angle, Approx. 461,000 dots
shutterspeed: 1-1/2000 sec., 15-1/2000 sec. (in Tv and M modes)
builtinflash: Auto, Flash On, Slow Synchro, Flash Off
whitebalance: Auto, Daylight, Cloudy, Tungsten, Fluorescent, Fluorescent H, Flash, Underwater, Custom 1, Custom 2
